channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2023110828
item.description:
Report X-2023110828

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-29T18:13:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-07
  • City: NATICK
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered during delivery. Package brought back to station. DescribePack: One of the bottles has a loose cap, no seals underneath the caps. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Upon return to station, package was brought to the hazmat cage.

item.title: Report E-2023110044
item.description:
Report E-2023110044

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-28T18:13:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-10
  • City: CHICOPEE
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported there was a 1gal release of UN1993 KZ-5430-RD from a 5gal metal pail on the dock. The cause was due to a forklift accident. Terminal personnel felt comfortable cleaning the release with oil dri and proper PPE. (1) 20-gallon metal drum of product, Oil Dri, and PPE were staged as waste onsite and left for the terminal to Manage.

item.title: Report X-2023101497
item.description:
Report X-2023101497

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-25
  • City: W SPRINGFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: DURING REWRAP (NO LEAK) PACKAGE WAS OPENED BY RESPONDER BECAUSE IT WAS WET FROM THE OUTSIDE. ITEMS INSIDE WERE METAL CONTAINERS WITH FLAMMABLE LIQUID DIAMOND LABELS ON THEM. UNDECLARED HAZMAT.
